text:
Anak itu masuk lagi ke kamar, menuju ke kasurnya. Wajahnya terlihat khawatir dan ragu. “Boleh aku sentuh jidatmu?”
[redacted_name] mengangguk.
Awalnya dia ingin menyentuh dengan telapak tangannya, tapi sadar tangan kurus itu masih kotor, dia mengubahnya menjadi punggung tangan. Tangannya dingin sekali, suhunya enak. [redacted_name] hampir tertidur hanya karena disentuh begitu.
“Suhu tubuhmu panas, sakit tenggorokan juga ya? Pilek juga ngga?”
[redacted_name] menggeleng.
“Batuk?”
Tenggorokannya cukup gatal tapi dia belum batuk si dari tadi.
“Ngga terlalu.”
“Oke. Aku bakal bilang ibu. Kamu tunggu sebentar ya!”
Anak itu menghilang lagi dari kamarnya. Beberapa menit kemudian kepala asisten masuk bersama [redacted_name]. Mereka membawa air dan berbagai jenis obat. [redacted_name] juga sudah memanggil dokter pribadi mereka agar segera ke rumah.
trans:
The child entered the room again, heading toward the bed. Her face looked worried and hesitant. “Can I touch your forehead?”
[redacted_name] nodded.
At first, she wanted to touch it with her palm, but realizing her thin hands were still dirty, she switched to the back of her hand instead. Her hands were so cold, the temperature felt nice. [redacted_name] nearly fell asleep just from that touch.
"Your body temperature is hot. Sore throat too? Any runny nose?"
[redacted_name] shook his head.
"Coughing?"
His throat was a bit itchy, but he hadn't coughed at all so far.
"Not really."
"Alright. I'll tell Mom. Wait here for a moment, okay!"
The child disappeared from the room again. A few minutes later, the assistant's head appeared alongside [redacted_name]. They brought water and various kinds of medicine. [redacted_name] had also called their personal doctor to come over as soon as possible.
